column5: Are you tired of all the challenges and costs of a trip to Canada - here's the solution:https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/an...46edfce84d4e2f
Was a cooler full of Labatts Blue allowed in the boat ?...........Lol.

This is in my backyard practically...these invasive Asian carp..(which the Great State of Illinois has renamed them Copi to help market them to the consumers) are a sight to see. There are charters around us here that you can go out on and shoot them off the back of the boat or pontoon with your bow. Many a morning headed out to fish or hunt have had them land in the boat.
Wearing a football helmet is a good idea when traveling the Illinois river.
